title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same file name under different directories to a zip file, the process fails.
EB: When exporting multiple files with the same name but located in different directories to a zip file, the zip file should be able to store all the files with their correct directory structure intact.
SR:
1. Create two files named 'foo.txt' in different directories within the project. 
2. Select both files and attempt to export them to a zip file. 
3. Verify that the export process fails and the zip file does not store the files with their correct directories.
